name: Forgotten Hero (Falonso)
description:
Mario is on another adventure! This time, someone else is bringing problems to the mushroom kingdom, and it's not bowser! Jump your way through enemies and take down whoever is doing this!

Forgotten hero is a super mario bros "creepypasta story", taking from inspiration other mario horror games, and the new super mario bros series.

This game is dedicated to the first Luigikid creepypasta challenge, and probably no further development will be added to the game, other than bug fixes in the future.

All characters showed in screen belongs to Nintendo.
